q1: Atletico Madrid is terrible.. do you agree?
a1: They're not too shabby in actuality because they have Griezmann as a striker and Oblak as the goalkeeper.
a2: They are actually an overachieving team if you asked me.

a3: Atletico Madrid competes against Barcelona every year
a4: Who has the higher winning record?
